Light's Grace.name: Light's Grace
descriptions: Your Flash of Light spell has a 33% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Your Flash of Light spell has a 66% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Your Flash of Light spell has a 100% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

Divine Strength.name: Divine Strength
descriptions: Increases your spell damage by 10% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by 20% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by 30% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by 40% of your healing power.
Increases your spell damage by 50% of your healing power.

Divine Intellect.name: Divine Intellect
descriptions: Increases your total Intellect by 2%.
Increases your total Intellect by 4%.
Increases your total Intellect by 6%.
Increases your total Intellect by 8%.
Increases your total Intellect by 10%.

Spiritual Focus.name: Spiritual Focus
descriptions: Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 14% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.
Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 28% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.
Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 42% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.
Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 56% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.
Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 70% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

Divine Strikes.name: Divine Strikes
descriptions: Increases the bonus damage of your Holy Strike by 10%.
Increases the bonus damage of your Holy Strike by 20%.
Increases the bonus damage of your Holy Strike by 30%.
Increases the bonus damage of your Holy Strike by 40%.
Increases the bonus damage of your Holy Strike by 50%.

Healing Light.name: Healing Light
descriptions: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 4%.
Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 8%.
Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 12%.
Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 16%.
Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 20%.

Holy Ground.name: Holy Ground
descriptions: Your Consecration causes friendly targets to regenerate 1% of their total health every second.

Revelation.name: Revelation
descriptions: Grants the target of Lay on Hands and Divine Intervention a 15% bonus to their armor value from items for 2 minutes.  In addition, the cooldown for these spells is reduced by 25 min.
Grants the target of Lay on Hands and Divine Intervention a 30% bonus to their armor value from items for 2 minutes.  In addition, the cooldown for these spells is reduced by 50 min.

Words of Wisdom.name: Words of Wisdom
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Wisdom Aura spell by 15%.
Increases the effect of your Wisdom Aura spell by 30%.

Illumination.name: Illumination
descriptions: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell, gives you a 20% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell, gives you a 40% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell, gives you a 60% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell, gives you a 80% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.
After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell, gives you a 100% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.

Sanctity Aura.name: Sanctity Aura
descriptions: Increases Holy damage done by friendly units within 40 yards by 10%.  Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
descriptions: When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

Sanctified Strike.name: Sanctified Strike
descriptions: Blesses your weapon, causing it to heal 10% of the damage dealt by your Holy Strike ability.
Blesses your weapon, causing it to heal 20% of the damage dealt by your Holy Strike ability.
Blesses your weapon, causing it to heal 30% of the damage dealt by your Holy Strike ability.
Blesses your weapon, causing it to heal 40% of the damage dealt by your Holy Strike ability.
Blesses your weapon, causing it to heal 50% of the damage dealt by your Holy Strike ability.

Holy Power.name: Holy Power
descriptions: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 2%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 3%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 4%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 5%.

Holy Shock.name: Holy Shock
descriptions:
Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing Holy damage to enemies and healing to allies. The damage and healing scales depending on The Paladin's equipment:

Shield: Armor Bonus
Buckler: Spell Power
Focus: Healing Power
Two-Hand: Attack Power
